00049 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 |   AP4_Command
00051 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 class AP4_Command : public AP4_Expandable
00053 {
00054  public:
00055     // constructor
00056     AP4_Command(AP4_UI08 tag, AP4_Size header_size, AP4_Size payload_size) :
00057         AP4_Expandable(tag, CLASS_ID_SIZE_08, header_size, payload_size) {}
00058 
00059     // AP4_Exandable methods
00060     virtual AP4_Result Inspect(AP4_AtomInspector& inspector);
00061 
00062     // methods
00063     AP4_UI08 GetTag() { return (AP4_UI08)m_ClassId; }
00064 };
